thread.section_title: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent | upad.co.uk
thread.title: Emma, Manchester
thread.title_full: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent reviewed by Emma, Manchester

author: Emma, Manchester
title: Emma, Manchester
text: So easy from the start, my experience has been a pleasure and unbelievable turnaround from initial ad, tenant enquiries which were abundant and immediate response to referencing. Superb value and with the choice of services, I would recommend Upad above all of the others. One happy landlord and customer !!
